name: Snail-Man
description:
This is my entry for the Wowie Jam 2.0! game jam.

Play as Snail-Man as he tries to defend his game from the evil Cyrus the Virus who is trying to corrupt the game for his own use. As Cyrus tries to take over Glitches keep occurring, creating some strange outcomes.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to shoot.
